name: Pilat Media
tag_list: broadcast-management, ad-sales, media-traffic, media-management, traffic-and-billing, media-rights-management, broadcast-automation, media-it--workflow, broadcast-workflow
overview:
Pilat Media is a supplier of powerful, integrated business management systems for the media industry.

Designed for content providers and service operators alike, Pilat Media’s award-winning systems improve business performance, accelerate time to market and enable diversification and growth by harmonizing and streamlining content programming, advertising sales, media operations and financial control. Pilat Media’s modular IBMS suite and MediaPro products can be deployed “out-of- the-box” or customized for specific business units or as an enterprise wide integrated system. Pilat Media provides a wide range of flexible solutions, including support for linear, on-demand and interactive services, video, radio and non-air media over any delivery platform.

external_links.title: Pilat Media to Support On Demand Services
